segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is balanced on a two-step stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's trying to get something from a large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the cookies inside; he's got one hand in there already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out at odd angles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's practically tipping backward, I can almost see it wobble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall at any moment, and that would be a nasty bump.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up, clearly complicit in this cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on the jar, completely oblivious to the danger her brother is in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool doesn't give way; it's a real accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a fall and broken dishes is very high.
segments.speaker: PAR
